trans-unit.resname: GDY·3 | All-Seeing Arbiter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GDY·3 | All-Seeing Arbiter | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, draw two cards, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, draw two cards, then discard a card.

trans-unit.resname: GDY·3 | All-Seeing Arbiter | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you discard a card, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-0 until your next turn, where X is the number of different mana values among cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you discard a card, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-0 until your next turn, where X is the number of different mana values among cards in your graveyard.

GDY·5 | Workshop Warchief | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

trans-unit.resname: GDY·5 | Workshop Warchief | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME dies, create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token.

trans-unit.resname: GDY·5 | Workshop Warchief | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Blitz {4}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
trans-unit.target: Blitz {4}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

trans-unit.resname: GDY·7 | Recruitment Officer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{W}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: {3}{W}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

trans-unit.resname: GDY·9 | Surge Engine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GDY·9 | Surge Engine | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {U}: CARDNAME loses defender and gains "This creature can't be blocked."
trans-unit.target: {U}: CARDNAME loses defender and gains "This creature can't be blocked."

trans-unit.resname: GDY·9 | Surge Engine | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}: CARDNAME becomes blue and has base power and toughness 5/4. Activate only if CARDNAME doesn't have defender.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}: CARDNAME becomes blue and has base power and toughness 5/4. Activate only if CARDNAME doesn't have defender.

trans-unit.resname: GDY·9 | Surge Engine | Card Text | Paragraph 4

trans-unit.target: {4}{U}{U}: Draw three cards. Activate only if CARDNAME is blue and only once.
